SELECT IFNULL(COUNT(task.id) , 0) AS count, IFNULL(SUM(task.money) , 0) AS money ,days.days AS dateTime FROM ( SELECT @date :=DATE_ADD(@date,INTERVAL+1 DAY) days FROM ( SELECT @date :=DATE_ADD(#{beginTime},INTERVAL-1 DAY) FROM lawyer_area ) tiem
WHERE @date < DATE(#{endTime})
) days LEFT JOIN lawyer_task AS task ON TO_DAYS(task.create_time)=TO_DAYS(days.days) AND task.fast_lawyer_id IS NOT NULL AND task.lawyer_type = 0 AND task.status = 4 and lawyer_id = #{lawyerId} and `fast_lawyer_name` like concat('%', #{fastLawyerName}, '%')
GROUP BY days.days

SELECT COUNT(*) AS count,`type` FROM lawyer_task WHERE 1=1 and pid = #{pid}
and date_format(create_time,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{beginTime},'%y%m%d')
and date_format(create_time,'%y%m%d') <= date_format(#{endTime},'%y%m%d')
and `p_name` like concat('%', #{pName}, '%') GROUP BY `type` ORDER BY count DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) AS count FROM lawyer_task WHERE order_no IS NOT NULL AND DATEDIFF(create_time,NOW())=-1
